name: PraeBot
description:
Reloading level...You will be doing that more often than inhaling during 1337 kilometer
marathon.Will you be able to complete at least one level?Unique difficulty will certainly make your experience memorable.

Make death counter go off scale!
Complete levels under a time limit or… Not.Unique Features:
  • Inhumane difficulty.
  • Simple controls and simple gameplay.
  • Modern no-polygon graphics.
  • Unique - you will be hearing this word a lot, atmosphere - N2 O2 Ar, stuff, you know.
  • Melodious soundtrack.
  • Modern DMR defense system against pirates and sorts like them.
  • Beautiful achievements.
  • Discord integration.
